Articles.Content: Even though it is not April fools I thought maybe a trick could be pulled without photoshopping in the stock game. For example" I landed on Ike "and you actually landed on the mun. So post a screenshot that is meant to look like something that it is not. The score is the hours it lasts before someone says "FAAAAAAAAAAAAKE". I will post mine at some point so it is not obvious that is is fake

This pic was made by Jean Deaux in response to my contribution to The KSP Game, which was to fake a Mun landing. The original specification was to take the screenshot somewhere Mun-like on Kerbin, at night with the real Mun 'accidentally' in view, but it turned out to be a bit harder to pull off than intended.
